medical_history.chief_complaint: Symptoms of right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain and melena.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had sudden onset of sharp RLQ pain coming in waves on an unspecified evening, three episodes of loose black tarry stools, and rigors. He had previously experienced hematemesis but felt better until the onset of new symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Carcinoma in situ of rectum, high blood sugars, hypertension, headaches, suicide attempt, polysubstance abuse.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of myocardial infarction (MI), brother underwent coronary artery bypass grafting (CABG), mother died of brain aneurysm.
